title: Clash not receiving SMS
body: Cant confirm my account because I am not receiving the SMS. Yes, I have check my phone number multiple times. It's a NZ number if that has anything to do with it.

replies.body: Did you take the 0 off the front? I dunno if that's your issue but it auto adds the country code so I can see that being a problem.
I've tried this aswell so unless i've typed my number wrong 6 times now i'm not getting the sms

I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support in that case. Seems like you're not the only one having this issue so hopefully they're aware and it'll be a quick fix.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
